content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: prismarine_wall
inventory=[{"type": "golden_leggings", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "purpur_slab", "quantity": 27, "index": 18}, {"type": "light_gray_stained_glass", "quantity": 38, "index": 24}, {"type": "clock", "quantity": 58, "index": 44}, {"type": "prismarine", "quantity": 6, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft a prismarine wall I need to place 6 prismarine blocks in a 2x3 grid in the crafting table. I will first move one of the prismarine blocks from slot 45 into slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 45 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: prismarine_wall
inventory=[{"type": "prismarine", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "golden_leggings", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "purpur_slab", "quantity": 27, "index": 18}, {"type": "light_gray_stained_glass", "quantity": 38, "index": 24}, {"type": "clock", "quantity": 58, "index": 44}, {"type": "prismarine", "quantity": 5, "index": 45}]
thought: Since I have already placed one prismarine block in the crafting grid, I will place another block next to it in slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 45 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: prismarine_wall
inventory=[{"type": "prismarine", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "prismarine", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "golden_leggings", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "purpur_slab", "quantity": 27, "index": 18}, {"type": "light_gray_stained_glass", "quantity": 38, "index": 24}, {"type": "clock", "quantity": 58, "index": 44}, {"type": "prismarine", "quantity": 4, "index": 45}]
thought: Now that I have two prismarine blocks in the crafting grid, I will place the third block next to them in slot 3.
Ok
act: move from slot 45 to slot 3 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: prismarine_wall
inventory=[{"type": "prismarine_slab", "quantity": 6, "index": 0}, {"type": "prismarine", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "prismarine", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "prismarine", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "golden_leggings", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "purpur_slab", "quantity": 27, "index": 18}, {"type": "light_gray_stained_glass", "quantity": 38, "index": 24}, {"type": "clock", "quantity": 58, "index": 44}, {"type": "prismarine", "quantity": 3, "index": 45}]
thought: Since I have already placed three prismarine blocks in the crafting grid, I will place another block below them in slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 45 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: prismarine_wall
inventory=[{"type": "prismarine", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "prismarine", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "prismarine", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "prismarine", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "golden_leggings", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "purpur_slab", "quantity": 27, "index": 18}, {"type": "light_gray_stained_glass", "quantity": 38, "index": 24}, {"type": "clock", "quantity": 58, "index": 44}, {"type": "prismarine", "quantity": 2, "index": 45}]
thought: Now that I have placed four prismarine blocks in the crafting grid, I will place another block next to them in slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 45 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: prismarine_wall
inventory=[{"type": "prismarine", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "prismarine", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "prismarine", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "prismarine", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "prismarine", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "golden_leggings", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "purpur_slab", "quantity": 27, "index": 18}, {"type": "light_gray_stained_glass", "quantity": 38, "index": 24}, {"type": "clock", "quantity": 58, "index": 44}, {"type": "prismarine", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: Since I have already placed five prismarine blocks in the crafting grid, I will place the last block next to them in slot 6.
Ok
act: move from slot 45 to slot 6 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: prismarine_wall
inventory=[{"type": "prismarine_wall", "quantity": 6, "index": 0}, {"type": "prismarine", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "prismarine", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "prismarine", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "prismarine", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "prismarine", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "prismarine", "quantity": 1, "index": 6}, {"type": "golden_leggings", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "purpur_slab", "quantity": 27, "index": 18}, {"type": "light_gray_stained_glass", "quantity": 38, "index": 24}, {"type": "clock", "quantity": 58, "index": 44}]
thought: Now that I have placed all the prismarine blocks in the crafting grid, I can craft the prismarine wall and move it to a free slot in my inventory (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 6
